Metalner Day MR2 Challenge
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): Archived Topics From Prior Years: Miscellaneous Messages: Metalner Day MR2 Challenge
By torey luvullo on Sunday, September 21, 2003 - 05:21 am:

Hello again! I am giving your "low budget" recap.

Before an excited...well, an interested...well, a darkly muttering crowd of 3 to 5, the MR2 Metalner Day competition took place. Kinetix, trained by Infernus; Lord de Seis, trained by Strunks, and Invader Zim, trained by Hellraiser, squared off in mortal combat. The battles were hard fought...well, actually they were somewhat contested...well, actually they were all sweeps.

Indeed the first sweep, Lord over Kinny, went as follows: Lightning, KO. Lightning, KO. Lightning, KO. The whole thing took about 10 seconds.

Kinny did a little better against Zimmy...He hit a few techs before the inevitable 3 KOs. One of the KOs came on a 999 one-hit on a tech[sorry - no notes - low budget, remember?] about which HR83 said "I've never seen that tech do 999 damage before."

Finally, the long-awaited showdown between Lord and Zimmy. Well, actually, it was awaited but a short time. Anyway, lots of things happened, but what I remember is Zimmy exploding and doing himself damage time and time again. I've never seen so much self-damage in one match. Mix in a few of Lord's lightnings, and Zimmy was quick fried to a crackly crunch, to the tune of a 3-0 sweep.

Thanx again for the pomp, the pageantry, the tradition that is Metalner Day MR2 contests!
